text: It is a valuable tool for managing the programme’s achievements and to monitor progress throughout the year.In general, an integrated monthly report that contains summary data on all immu­ nization, should contain the following elements with regards to HPV vaccination: The number of HPV1 and HPV2 doses by age or year of birth administered in the month (and by sex if males are also targeted); Stocks received and used, including vaccines and injection equipment, and wastage; The number of adverse events following immunization (AEFI) reported or identified.
